short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopping the internet in the smart way

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add to your myList any product from any site supported by mylist, and have all your wishes and shopping plans organized in one place. 

In the future, myList will help you to buy what you want in the price you want and help you to have the best decision about your shopping preferences. 

Download the myList button today! We promise it will be worth the place on your chrome browser!
